coffees.title: Traditional Espresso
coffees.description: The classic coffee made with hot water and ground beans

coffees.title: American Espresso
coffees.description: Diluted espresso, less intense than the traditional one

coffees.title: Iced Espresso
coffees.description: A drink made with espresso and ice cubes

coffees.title: Coffee with Milk
coffees.description: Half and half of traditional espresso with steamed milk

coffees.title: Latte
coffees.description: A shot of espresso with twice as much milk and creamy foam

coffees.title: Capuccino
coffees.description: A cinnamon-flavored drink made with equal parts coffee, milk, and foam

coffees.title: Macchiato
coffees.description: Espresso mixed with a bit of hot milk and foam

coffees.title: Mocha
coffees.description: Espresso mixed with a bit of hot milk, chocolate, and foam

coffees.title: Hot Chocolate
coffees.description: A drink made with chocolate dissolved in hot milk and coffee

coffees.title: Cuban Coffee
coffees.description: Iced espresso drink with rum, heavy cream, and mint

coffees.title: Hawaiian Coffee
coffees.description: A sweetened drink made with coffee and coconut milk

coffees.title: Arabic Coffee
coffees.description: A drink made with Arabica coffee beans and spices

coffees.title: Irish Coffee
coffees.description: Coffee-based drink with Irish whiskey, sugar, and whipped cream
